clarke_review.primary_message: Pytest collection aborts due to a NameError triggered at import time in the test module (pivoting from prior f-string syntax error): "E   NameError: name 'result' is not defined".
evidence: E   NameError: name 'result' is not defined

ada_change_correlation.suspected_cause_from_ada: Edit to assertion introduced an unescaped inner f-string expression inside an outer f-string template used for dynamic test generation.
ada_change_correlation.justification: Ada modified the exact assertion line; the new code includes "f\"... {result.get(...)} ...\"" inside an outer f-string (used to build 'src'), causing Python to evaluate {result...} at module import and raise NameError.
